title.value: UK Core Encounter Location Type Wales

description.value: A set of codes that define the classification of location type. These codes and their descriptions represent concepts used in Wales and are copied from the content of the NHS Wales Data Dictionary Location Type Code web page at http://www.datadictionary.wales.nhs.uk/index.html#!WordDocuments/locationtypecode.htm on 18/11/2021.
